00017 Cylinder::Cylinder(CvPoint2D32f p, CNewVisionDoc* doc) {
00018         this->doc = doc;
00019         this->p1 = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00020         this->p2 = p1;
00021         this->R = 1;

00041 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00042 bool Cylinder::Move(CvPoint3D32f p) {
00043         p1.x += p.x; p1.y += p.y; p1.z += p.z;
00044         p2.x += p.x; p2.y += p.y; p2.z += p.z;
00045         return true;
00046 }
00047 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 bool Cylinder::Move1(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00049         // move base center
00050         p1 = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00051         p2 = p1;
00052         return true;
00053 }
00054 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 bool Cylinder::Move2(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00056         // move radius
00057         CvPoint3D32f rp = doc->cameramodel.coordsImage2Real(p);
00058         R = d(rp, p1);
00059         return true;
00060 }
00061 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 bool Cylinder::Move3(CvPoint2D32f p) {
00063         // change height
00064         p2.z = (float)doc->cameramodel.computeZ(p, p1);
00065         return true;
00066 }

00069         return false;

00074 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075 void Cylinder::DrawFloor(CDC* pDC, int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {
00076         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(pen);
00077         CBrush* pOldBrush = (CBrush*)pDC->SelectStockObject(HOLLOW_BRUSH);
00078         CvPoint im = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(p1);
00079         CvSize r = doc->floormodel.sizeReal2Floor(cvSize2D32f(R, R));
00080         pDC->Ellipse(im.x-DOT-ox, im.y-DOT-oy, im.x+DOT-ox, im.y+DOT-oy);
00081 
00082         // draw base 
00083         CPen base(PS_SOLID, 0, RGB(0, 255, 255)); pDC->SelectObject(base);
00084         pDC->Ellipse(im.x-r.width-ox, im.y-r.height-oy, im.x+r.width-ox, im.y+r.height-oy);
00085 
00086         // draw label
00087         int TEXT_HEIGHT = 16;
00088         CRect rToolTip(im.x-r.width-ox,im.y-TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy, im.x+r.width-ox, im.y+TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy);
00089         drawStaticToolTip(pDC, label, rToolTip);
00090 
00091         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00092         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00093         return; 
00094 }

00099 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00100 void Cylinder::DrawFrame(CDC* pDC , int ox, int oy, CPen* pen) {
00101         CPen* pOldPen = pDC->SelectObject(pen);
00102         CBrush* pOldBrush = (CBrush*)pDC->SelectStockObject(HOLLOW_BRUSH);
00103         // draw vertices
00104         CvPoint im1 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(p1));
00105         CvPoint im2 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(p2));
00106         pDC->Ellipse(im1.x-DOT-ox, im1.y-DOT-oy, im1.x+DOT-ox, im1.y+DOT-oy);
00107         pDC->Ellipse(im2.x-DOT-ox, im2.y-DOT-oy, im2.x+DOT-ox, im2.y+DOT-oy);
00108 
00109         // find bounding rectangle for the bottom & top pancake
00110         double D = sqrt(p1.x*p1.x+p1.y*p1.y);
00111         double co = p1.x/D;
00112         double si = p1.y/D;
00113         if (Double::IsNaN(co) || Double::IsNaN(si))
00114                 return;
00115         CvPoint3D32f lt3B = cvPoint3D32f(p1.x+R*co-R*si, p1.y+R*si-R*co, p1.z);
00116         CvPoint3D32f rb3B = cvPoint3D32f(p1.x-R*co+R*si, p1.y-R*si+R*co, p1.z);
00117         CvPoint3D32f lt3U = cvPoint3D32f(p1.x+R*co-R*si, p1.y+R*si-R*co, p2.z);
00118         CvPoint3D32f rb3U = cvPoint3D32f(p1.x-R*co+R*si, p1.y-R*si+R*co, p2.z);
00119         CvPoint ltB  = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(lt3B));
00120         CvPoint rbB  = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(rb3B));
00121         CvPoint ltU  = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(lt3U));
00122         CvPoint rbU  = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(rb3U));
00123 
00124         // draw base and top
00125         CPen base(PS_SOLID, 0, RGB(0, 255, 255)); pDC->SelectObject(base);
00126         pDC->Ellipse(ltB.x-ox, ltB.y-oy, rbB.x-ox, rbB.y-oy);
00127         pDC->Ellipse(ltU.x-ox, ltU.y-oy, rbU.x-ox, rbU.y-oy);
00128 
00129         // draw vertical lines
00130         CPen vert(PS_SOLID, 0, RGB(128, 255, 128));pDC->SelectObject(vert);
00131         //pDC->MoveTo(cPoint(im[0])+off);pDC->LineTo(cPoint(im[4])+off);
00132         
00133 
00134         // draw label
00135         int TEXT_HEIGHT = 16;
00136         CRect rToolTip(ltU.x-ox,(ltB.y+rbU.y)/2-TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy, rbB.x-ox, (ltB.y+rbU.y)/2+TEXT_HEIGHT/2-oy);
00137         drawStaticToolTip(pDC, label, rToolTip);
00138 
00139         pDC->SelectObject(pOldPen);
00140         pDC->SelectObject(pOldBrush);
00141         return; 
00142 }

00152 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00153 CvPoint3D32f Cylinder::GetCenter() {
00154         CvPoint3D32f center = cvPoint3D32f(p1.x, p1.y, (p1.z + p2.z)/2);
00155         return center;
00156 }
00157 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00158 double Cylinder::GetDistanceFromCamera() {
00159         return doc->cameramodel.coordsDistanceFromCamera(GetCenter());
00160 }
00161 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00162 void Cylinder::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00163         
00164         if( archive.IsStoring() ) {
00165                 archive << label;
00166                 archive << p1.x << p1.y << p1.z;
00167                 archive << p2.x << p2.y << p2.z;
00168                 archive << R;
00169         }
00170         else {
00171                 archive >> label;
00172                 archive >> p1.x >> p1.y >> p1.z;
00173                 archive >> p2.x >> p2.y >> p2.z;
00174                 archive >> R;
00175         }
00176 }
00177 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00178 bool Cylinder::IsFramePointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00179         CvPoint v1 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(p1));
00180         CvPoint v2 = cvPointFrom32f(doc->cameramodel.coordsReal2Image(p2));
00181         if(d(point, v1) <= DOT) {
00182                 pcurrent = p1;
00183                 return true;
00184         }
00185         if(d(point, v2) <= DOT) {
00186                 pcurrent = p2;
00187                 return true;
00188         }
00189         return false;
00190 }
00191 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192 bool Cylinder::IsFloorPointIn(CvPoint point, CvPoint3D32f& pcurrent) {
00193         CvPoint v1 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(p1);
00194         CvPoint v2 = doc->floormodel.coordsReal2Floor(p2);
00195         if(d(point, v1) <= DOT) {
00196                 pcurrent = p1;
00197                 return true;
00198         }
00199         if(d(point, v2) <= DOT) {
00200                 pcurrent = p2;
00201                 return true;
00202         }
00203         return false;
00204 }
